summary: This mod adds dozens of new lore friendly beverages that are sure to quench your thirst.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds dozens of new lore friendly beverages that are sure to quench your thirst. 

Skyrim is great, but upon walking into one of the taverns I see the barkeep trying to sell me a $75 bottle of mead. So i decided to create a mod that adds a increased but realistic selection of beverages.They will become available in taverns and can be found on bodies or on your travels.  

These new drinks include:

* Cyrodilic Brandy
author: Icylemonlime
